description: NBC news' branding problem, and how hacking could lead to tax fraud.
contentencoded: Truth, democracy, and the branding problem for NBC news without Brian Williams. Plus, first comes the hack, then comes the … tax fraud? That's one of the worries coming out of investigations into two different events last week: A flood of phony tax filings sent using TurboTax, and a major hack of Anthem health insurance.
title: PODCAST: First comes hacking, then comes fraud
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, February 11, 2015
contenttemplated:
